page.title: 11CHURCHES_HUSBANDS BOSWORTH
page.content: In our church Husbands Bosworth there are three instruments,the piano,organ and bells.Now we use electric lights in the church, before we used to use oil lamps and candles.The Rev H.O New_ man who used to look after Husbands_ Bosworth church died in 1960.The church clock was restored in 1983 by G.A Armitage.We also had a new alter_ native service book in 1980.One of the stained glass windows is of the heal_ ing of the paralysed man.The font is used for christenings and the altar is for taking the Holy Communion.All Saints Church has five bells and there is room for one more.Mr Armitage does the bell ringing there is also a Methodist church by the village hall and a Roman Catholic church in the grounds of Bosworth Hall.
